meanings.sent1: The children were woot about the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent2: She had a woot smile on her face when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The woot puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The woot flowers bloomed brightly in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The woot music filled the room with happiness.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of triumph or celebration.
meanings.sent3: Woot! I found my missing sock!
meanings.sent4: Woot! The sun is shining so brightly today!
meanings.sent5: Woot! The cake turned out perfectly!
